question: how many years of experience has he had as a Softwareentwickler at INFORM?
answer: With Master of Science - MS from Maastricht University, Master of Science - MS from Reykjavik University, Bachelor of Science - BS from Aachen University of Applied Sciences - FH Aachen, Florian Falter has 3 yrs 1 mo of experience as a Software-Entwickler at INFORM GmbH - Optimization Software in Städteregion Aachen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Deutschland, 2 yrs 2 mos of experience as a Software-Entwickler at INFORM GmbH - Optimization Software in Städteregion Aachen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Deutschland, 3 yrs of experience as a Ausbildung Mathematisch-technischer Softwareentwickler at INFORM GmbH - Optimization Software in Städteregion Aachen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Deutschland and is proficient in C++, C#, Python (Programmiersprache), Java, Programmierschnittstellen, Optimierung.
